column1: 1224|12:24|12:24 My legs are in total agony. I've been kneeling on hard tiles
column3: for what seems like hours. There are little ridges where the tiles have dug into my knees
column4: and I'm boiling hot and the cleaning chemicals are making me cough. All I want is a rest. But I can't stop for a moment. I am so behind.
